nodes.text: Major Brom was a male Nautolan who served the Galactic Republic as an aide to the Strategic Advisor to Alderaan for the Republic Army and leader of the First Alderaan Support Division Jace Malcom during the Cold War.

During the Alderaan Civil War, Brom worked with Malcom to ensure the safety and tactical superiority of House Organa's forces—a difficult task, given the Organa's inexperience in military affairs and traditional pacifism.
